alert.note: Alert for Central and Southeast Phillips; Central and Southern Valley; Daniels; Garfield; McCone; Northern Phillips; Northern Valley; Petroleum; Southwest Phillips; Western Roosevelt (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued June 03 at 1:55PM MDT until June 04 at 1:00AM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH NOW IN EFFECT THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...A portion of northeast Montana, including the following areas, Central and Southeast Phillips, Central and Southern Valley, Daniels, Garfield, McCone, Northern Phillips, Northern Valley, Petroleum, Southwest Phillips and Western Roosevelt. * WHEN...Through Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Creeks and streams may rise out of their banks. Low-water crossings may be flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Streams, creeks, and rivers remain elevated and some continue to rise, though the rate of water level rise has slowed according to Emergency Management. Scattered showers and isolated thunderstorms will continue to be present, however precipitation is expected to be light. Localized thunderstorms may produce brief heavy downpours. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.

area.areaDesc: Central and Southeast Phillips; Central and Southern Valley; Daniels; Garfield; McCone; Northern Phillips; Northern Valley; Petroleum; Southwest Phillips; Western Roosevelt
